resources.string: The recipient receives the SMS encrypted form
Enter the number, to send SMS
Do you want to stock unencrypted message?
Try again, Can not send your message.

The SMScif main objective is offer confidence for users SMS messaging mobile. That is, only allow the knowledge of the information to those who are authorized.\n\nFor protection of this security vulnerability mentioned above, SMScif implements the encryption algorithm AES (Advanced Encryption Standard), compatible with the standard proposed by NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology), using a 128-bit key (16 characters) defined by the user to complete the encryption process.

SMScif permit send an SMS text message in plain text or encrypted, asking for a password, which will only be known by the sender and receiver user.

1. On the Main screen, select New SMS icon. 
2. Select or enter the contact number.
3. Enter your message and press the Encrypt icon. 
4. Enter a password with at least 1 letter and a maximum of 16 and press the OK icon. 
5. Click the Send button, the encrypted message will be send.

1. On the main screen, select Open SMS icon. 
2. Appear listed every conversation, select the conversation of a contact.
In this screen you can enter, encrypt and send a SMS. 
3. Choose a encrypted message from the list. 
4. The key used by the user that sent the SMS will be requested.
5. Press the Decrypt icon. 

This view is also possible to answer the SMS using the Reply icon.

Is possible encrypt one or multiple stored conversations SMS, using the same key defined by the user to encrypt completely conversations. 

1. Press the Encrypt Stored SMS icon on the main screen. 
2. Activate the checkbox of one or multiple contacts to encrypt the entire conversation and press the Encrypt icon. 
3. Enter a password with at least 1 letter and a maximum of 16 and press the OK icon.

You can encrypt one or multiple SMS from a specific contact, saved in store messaging mobile, whether plain text or encrypted. 

1. Press the Encrypt Stored SMS icon on the main screen. 
2. Select the tab > to select SMS of a specific contac.
3. Activate the boxes for one or more messages and click the Encrypt icon.
4. Enter a password with at least 1 letter and a maximum of 16 and press the OK icon.

The SMS selected will be saved with the encrypted content, the key with which they were encrypted is required to consult the message.
